content.question: New England Puritans sought primarily to create which of the following in Massachusetts?

choices.label: A missionary community focused on converting American Indians to Christianity
Town meetings at which all adult males could vote
A model community promoting government by strict religious principles
A society founded on the principles of religious toleration
A community whose members achieved salvation through good works

content.answer: A model community promoting government by strict religious principles
